availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jason H. M. Billington (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Master mason in the Lovelaceville Lodge, No. 157, in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Lovelaceville District, p. 155. Proceedings of the Grand Lodge of Kentucky, at a Grand Annual Communication, Held in the City of Louisville, on Monday, the 16th Day of October, 1860 (Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges & Co., 1860), p. 133.
